Replace.Text: Receive boosts upon city conquest: a [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka for each Encampment or Campus in the conquered city and an [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspiration for each Holy Site or Theater Square.

+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity with Political Philosophy civic. Receive +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold and +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for routes between your own cities. Roads built in your territory are one level more advanced than usual.
Cities do not incur war weariness. All military units heal completely when this player captures a city with a world wonder.

+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement for the first 10 turns after declaring a Surprise War on a major civilization. No penalties to yields in occupied cities. Declaring a Surprise War only counts as a Formal War for the purpose of warmongering and war weariness.

A building unique to Macedon.+25% combat experience for all melee, ranged land units, and Hetairoi trained in this city. Gain [ICON_SCIENCE] Science equal to 25% of the unit's cost when a non civilian unit is created in this city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May not be built in an Encampment district that already has a Stable.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Pairidaeza, unique to Persia.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. +2 Appeal. +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each adjacent Holy Site and Theater Square. +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each adjacent Commercial Hub and City Center. Additional [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Tourism] Tourism as you advance through the Technology and Civics Tree. Cannot be built on Snow, Tundra, Snow Hills, or Tundra Hills or adjacent to another Pairidaeza.
Macedonian unique melee unit that replaces the Swordsman. +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when besieging districts. 50% Additional Support Bonus.

Macedonian unique heavy cavalry unit that replaces the Horseman. Additional +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when adjacent to a Great General. +5 Great General points when killing an enemy unit. Starts with 1 free Promotion.
Persian unique melee unit that replaces the Swordsman. Melee class unit with a ranged attack, [ICON_Range] Range 2. Strong defense strength.
+5 Combat Bonus from adjacent Great General
